```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(stringr)
library(openxlsx)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(writexl)
```

# input data
```{r}
data001=read_excel('all_page_review_list_final_new.xlsx')
```

# clean data
```{r}
data002=data001 %>% clean_names()
```

```{r}
glimpse(data002)
```
```{r}
data003=data002 %>% arrange(all_page_score)
glimpse(data003)
```
